title: BRIEF-India's Dynemic Products Sept Quarter Net Profit Rises
text:
BRIEF-India's Dynemic Products Sept Quarter Net Profit Rises

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 12:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Dynemic Products Sept Quarter Net Profit Rises Oct 21 (Reuters) - Dynemic Products Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 54.7 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 43 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER INCOME FROM OPERATIONS 435.8 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 376.4 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO Further company coverage: DYPR.NS

BRIEF-India's Dynemic Products Sept Quarter Net Profit Rises
